channel.title: Orphaned case
channel.description:
src\server\model\players\Client.java:490: orphaned case case 4: //donator ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
[code] public void loginMessage() { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; switch (playerRights){ //case 0: //Regular Player //c2.sendMessage("[PLAYER] "+playerName+" has logged in."); //break; case 1: //mod c2.sendMessage("[MODERATOR] "+playerName+" has logged in."); break; case 2: //admin c2.sendMessage("[ADMINISTRATOR] "+playerName+" has logged in."); break; case 3: } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("JavaTC")) { c2.sendMessage("The Owner Of ScapeCraft "+playerName+" Has Logged In."); break; case 4: //donator c2.sendMessage("[DONATOR] "+playerName+" has logged in."); break; //case 5: //idk //c2.sendMessage("[PLAYER] "+playerName+" has logged in."); //break; } } } } [/code] It shows messages on login.

item.title: Orphaned case
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:


The [i]}[/i] should be [b]below[/b]:
[code=Java]
c2.sendMessage("The Owner Of ScapeCraft "+playerName+" Has Logged In.");[/code]

The } should be below:

c2.sendMessage("The Owner Of ScapeCraft "+playerName+" Has Logged In.");

Read full topic

item.title: Orphaned case
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,438121.0.html
That’s the link to a tutorial for Compiling Errors that a Mod made. Helped me out with orphaned case. Do CTRL+F and search “orphaned case”

item.title: Orphaned case

item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Try adding a } after the third case after the break.

item.title: Orphaned case
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

src\server\model\players\Client.java:490: orphaned case case 4: //donator ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
		public void loginMessage() {
				for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
					if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
						Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
						switch (playerRights){
							//case 0: //Regular Player
								//c2.sendMessage("[PLAYER] "+playerName+" has logged in.");
							//break;
							case 1: //mod
								c2.sendMessage("[MODERATOR] "+playerName+" has logged in.");
							break;
							case 2: //admin
								c2.sendMessage("[ADMINISTRATOR] "+playerName+" has logged in.");
							break;
							case 3:
							} if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("JavaTC")) {
								c2.sendMessage("The Owner Of ScapeCraft "+playerName+" Has Logged In.");
							break;
							case 4: //donator
								c2.sendMessage("[DONATOR] "+playerName+" has logged in.");
							break;
							
							//case 5: //idk
								//c2.sendMessage("[PLAYER] "+playerName+" has logged in.");
							//break;
						}
					}
				}
	}

It shows messages on login.

Read full topic
